basic.description:
A survey of women writers from before 1900. Historical focus of course may vary from year to year; for detailed information, consult the Department. 
NOTE    Also offered as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. When offered as a distance course, it is focused on nineteenth-century women writers in English.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Selected Women Writers I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  A grade of C in ENGL100 (or ENGL110) or registration in a GNDS plan
